tidbits.title: Ancient Civilization
tidbits.description: Greece is the birthplace of Western civilization, renowned for its ancient contributions to philosophy, democracy, art, and the Olympic Games.

tidbits.title: Stunning Islands
tidbits.description: The country is home to numerous stunning islands in the Aegean and Ionian Seas, each offering unique beauty, history, and picturesque landscapes.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Greek cuisine is celebrated globally, featuring delicious dishes like moussaka, souvlaki, and baklava, accompanied by rich flavors and fresh ingredients.
